title: Star Guardian Soraka no longer available?...
body: I'd love to purchase this skin, but it's not showing up when I search for it in skins. Was it limited edition or something? :/

replies.body:
Star Guardian skins are set to release on September 7th so they are currently not available for purchase just yet

they are not Limited or Legacy either
The new set of SG skins haven't even been made available yet.

Hi hi! 

All of the Star Guardian skins are in the 7.17 build, which is why you're seeing them, but they're locked. This is normal! All content will show up when a patch goes out, but may not be available. Soraka and the others will be available on September 7th! :)
Aaa! I can't wait that long! I need Soraka **NOW!**
i almost had a heart attack reading the title was like: "OMG,when did they come out?what happened to September 7? they out of sale already? but they are not legacy? WHY?"

Not to worry, my dude.

Skins aren't released yet, and they aren't limited purchase. Once they're out, you'll have an eternity to buy them.

Though there is some form of loading screen border that comes with these skins, so I think that might be limited-time offer. Or it might be based on a quest, I have no idea. In any case I don't give a fuck I just need my Star Guardian Syndra.
